attributes.action: Say no to bedroom tax for private rented
attributes.additional_details: Don't let the government discriminate between social housing tenants and private renting tenants. There has always and still is bedroom tax for private rented tenants . It is unfair and is against our human rights. Pensioners and disabled people live in private rented accommodation and it is about time with the social housing shortage that private rentals are treated exactly the same as social housing tenants
